title: Star Guardians | League of Legends

embed.description: They are protectors blazing bright, yet destined to collapse as furiously as they burn. They are the Star Guardians.

body:
Never in my life have I had such an urge to drop everything and watch sailor moon....

Proper anime skins... RIOT knows how to empty my wallet..

replies.body:
whenever i go on that page it just shows the star guardian logo thing and nothing else?

???

My bank account is not going to like this 
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

That Jinx skin is sooooo good!!!!!!!!

I mean a lot of my friends don't like that League is becoming weaboo BUT I LOVE IT!!!!!
Why is someone who want's to blow everything literally to smithereens a guardian of something????  Cool skins but.
I'm not the biggest magical girl fan. But I do love anime and these skins are on point =D
LOVE these, so glad you make these sorts of girly skins too!

Same here. 
Poppy is the champ that I play out of them (but will probably pick Janna's one up too) 

2 of my other friends always play Jinx and Lulu.
So i see a very sparkly team in my future xD

I just cant wait to play My main (Sol) and just command my friends to guard me.
I've heard rumors that the jinx skin might be a legendary{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I did not expext this from you.

I am a big anime fan, and like most genres of it xD

If they were Fullmetal Alchemist-esq skins however.... i may need a 2nd job.
Probably the closest we will ever get to League anime
